name: Jasione
description: Jasione is a genus of about 15 species of flowering plants in the family Campanulaceae, native to Europe and Middle East. The most popular species are Jasione Montana and Jasione Laevis.These plants have spherical, pincushion-like flowers, subtended by involucral bracts. They are good as cut flowers, in borders or rock gardens.
meaning: Jasione is of uncertain origin and may be partly derived from the Greek word “ion”, meaning “violet”.
color_description: The flowers are blue or purple in color,
